content: crochet pattern to make a hippo snuggle blanket my own design this pattern gives you a step by step guide on making this lovely hippo snuggle blanket uk terminology difficultly experienced gauge not essential for this item items you will need to make this pattern multi coloured acrylic baby soft yarn pink yarn for nose and hands 4mm crochet hook polyester stuffing safety eyes or black wool if you sew on the eyes tapestry needle pattern stitch markers finished sizes approx 30cm x 30cm blanket you will need to know the basics of crocheting toys increasing and decreasing and the magic_ring step by step guide on how to crochet the snuggle blanket and hippo
